*** I want to submit my own proposal for an internship site at the workplace of my choice. Where should I start? ***
Register in the internship portal and choose the mode of internship that suits you: https://www.mat.umk.pl/group/wmii/praktyki-zawodowe
The next steps of the procedure will be indicated to you through the messages of the internship portal.
Documents: agreement and practice plan - related to the start of practice in the mode of your own proposal should be submitted by the end of May.

*** Who writes the plan for my professional practice? ***
*The institution hosting the internship.
The internship program from the Regulations for Professional Student Internships of the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science of the Nicolaus Copernicus University will be a hint:
1. to get acquainted with the organizational structures and mechanisms of operation of the business entity [...] where the internship is carried out.
2. to become familiar with the ways of using mathematical, economic or IT tools in the activities of the business entity.
3. to participate in projects and assist in the implementation of tasks related to the applications of mathematics, economics or computer science carried out by the workplace.

These are general guidelines. The points of the practice plan should result from the specifics of the company's activities.

*** I want to get credit on the basis of my work or other activity of a nature that meets the requirements of the internship program. Where should I start? ***
Register in the apprenticeship system and choose the mode of apprenticeship suitable for you: https://www.mat.umk.pl/group/wmii/praktyki-zawodowe.
The next steps of the procedure will be indicated to you through the messages of the internship portal.

*** I am studying for a degree in mathematics. In which institutions can I do my internship? ***
Students majoring in mathematics can do their internship in, for example, the Statistical Office, banks, insurance companies, accounting offices, accounting departments of various institutions, Tax Offices, Municipal Offices, City Offices, Marshal's Offices, Labor Offices, etc.

*** Until when are documents accepted for the academic year ? ***
Documents: agreement and practice plan - related to the start of the internship in the mode of own proposal should be submitted by the end of May.

*** How long does the mandatory practice last ? ***
It depends. If you are studying in the field of mathematics - non-teaching specialty or in the field of computer science (undergraduate studies: full-time and part-time), then your internship must last *3 weeks*.
If you are studying in the field of computer science (engineering studies) or in the field of mathematics and economics or in the field of applied mathematics, your mandatory internship must last 4 *weeks*.

*** What documents do I need to provide to get credit for my internship? ***
You will always receive the next steps of the internship settlement procedure in messages
From the system of the portal https://www.mat.umk.pl/group/wmii/praktyki-zawodowe

*** I work as an IT specialist (I am employed as an IT specialist, under an employment contract). Am I obliged to do an internship? ***
You can apply for internship credit on the *basis of your work or other activity* of a nature that meets the requirements of the internship program.
Documentation on the basis of which you can apply for credit for the internship is: an application to the dean generated from the internship portal, together with the documents of attachments indicated in its content and delivered to the faculty internship supervisor: employment contract, documents certifying its completion (e.g., a certificate from the employer detailing the duties performed by the student/employee on the job, financial documents, employer's opinion).
Register in the internship portal https://www.mat.umk.pl/group/wmii/praktyki-zawodowe
and select the mode in which you want to complete the internship. Subsequent messages from the system will tell you how to proceed.
